title: Get a connection
description: Retrieves information about a specified BigQuery connection.

objective.narrative: Developers often need to inspect the configuration of a connection before using it to query an external data source. This sample provides the code to fetch a connection's properties, which is useful for debugging or for programmatic verification of connection settings.

regionTags.name: bigqueryconnection_v1_connectionservice_connection_get
regionTags.title: Get a connection
regionTags.description: Retrieves information about a specified BigQuery connection.
